This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Valid transition-property values.
PASS Unknown transition-property values.
PASS Invalid transition-property values.
PASS Valid transition-duration values.
PASS Invalid transition-duration values.
PASS Valid transition-timing-function values.
PASS Invalid transition-timing-function values.
PASS Valid transition-delay values.
PASS Invalid transition-delay values.
PASS Valid transition shorthand values.
PASS Invalid transition shorthand values.
FAIL Ambiguous shorthand values. assert_equals: expected "all" but got "initial"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
